Schema.name: Shared Operational Support (Common Back Office Functions)

Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Shared Operational Support (Common Back Office Functions)

ExpressionView.SQL: select cp4.ID, cp4.DESIGNATION, cp4.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp4.COUNTRY_LEVELHACT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as COUNTRY_LEVELHACT_COUNT, CASE cp4.COUNTRY_LEVELHACT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as COUNTRY_LEVELHACT, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN CP4.INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE_COUNT, CASE CP4.INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER_AVAILABLE, CASE WHEN CP4.HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES_COUNT, CASE CP4.HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HASBOSCOMMON_SERVICE_LINES, cp4integratedservicecenter.HOST_ID, cp4integratedservicecenter.BUDGET, cp4integratedservicecenter.CLIENT_SATISFACTION_SCORE_ID from CP4COMMON_SERVICES_HARMONIZED_BUSINES_PRACTICES cp4, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v, CP4INTEGRATED_SERVICE_CENTER cp4integratedservicecenter WHERE cp4.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp4.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp4integratedservicecenter.PARENT_ID = CP4.ID AND cp4.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp4.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp4.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp4.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp4.ENTITY_YEAR
